caption.title: Raw data
caption.p: The occurrence rate of F. oxysporum and F. fujikuroi on I. cairica in different habitats. The comparison of the abundance of F. oxysporum and F. fujikuroi between infected and healthy leaves of I. cairica in the field. The pathogenicity of F. oxysporum and F. fujikuroi to I. cairica. The effects of pre-inoculation with F. oxysporum, F. fujikuroi alone and a mixture of both on growth parameters of I. cairica infected with C. gloeosporioides. The effects of pre-inoculation with F. oxysporum, F. fujikuroi alone and a mixture of both on physiological characteristics of I. cairica infected with C. gloeosporioides. The effects of pre-inoculation with F. oxysporum, F. fujikuroi alone and a mixture of both on hormone content and NPR1 expression in leaves of I. cairica. The morphological characteristic of representative isolates JY1, JY2 and JY3.
